metadata.description: Enter the world of Richard Sala. It's eerie, sometimes bizarre, and always hypnotic! Meet masked detetives, tormented narrators, deranged doctors, prowling gorillas, villains and victims. Sala's comic strips are gemlike short stories, surreal and absurd where you'll find yourself tangled up with elements of old B-movies, detective thrillers, and dark laughter.
metadata.name: Hypnotic Tales
